duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive global standardization of logistics reporting and metrics across all regions.
Manage, maintain, and own all existing Global Logistics dashboards/reporting.
Support the development, testing, and deployment for new business requirement dashboards and reports.
Partner with strategic logistics vendors to develop external database integration and data feeds.
Utilize analytics to improve decision making and identify continuous improvement opportunities.
Lead and support cost savings opportunities and other value-added initiatives within Global Planning, Sourcing and Logistics.
Partner with regional teams to drive logistics reporting/metric/OMI/dashboard standardization across the globe.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Supply Chain Management or related field (Master's Degree preferred)
APICS Certification or Lean Six Sigma Certifications or Scrum Master certification
